naslov: Prodaja - Luksuzna vila s bazenom i garažom - Šestine (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Luksuzna vila s bazenom i garažom - Šestine Prošećite nekretninom na linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=5aLZwPpj2HC Prodajemo ekskluzivnu vilu na odličnoj lokaciji u Šestinama. Vila se nalazi na parceli površine 747 m2 te se prostire na 4 etaže, uključujući, poslovni prostor i garažu. Površina vile je cca 580 m2 te se sastoji od: Podruma cca 100 m2: spremište s kotlovnicom i automatikom za bazen. Prizemlje: ulazni hodnik, open space dnevni boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, izlaz na terasu i zatvoreni bazen, balkon, kupaonica i dodatni wc + poslovni prostor 20 m2 s odvojenim ulazom i terasom. 1. kat: 4 spavaće sobe, kuhinja i kupaonica. Visoko potkrovlje / tavan: roh bau open space od kojega se može napraviti još jedna stambena jedinica. U dvorištu se nalazi garaža za 2 automobila cca 80 m2 te roštilj. Vila je građena prije 1968. godine, no 2021. godine je rađena kompletna adaptacija: promijenjene su sve instalacije, zidovi, pogovi, keramika i parketi, prozori. Vila je luksuzno namještena te se takva i prodaje. Grijanje je centralno plinsko + podno u prizemlju i svim kupaonama. Rolete su električne na daljinsko upravljanje, vila je opremljena video nadzorom (16 kamera), 3 klima uređaja, protuprovalna vrata. Neposredna blizina Crkve i autobusne stanice u Šestinama. __________________________________________________ For Sale - Luxury Villa with Pool and Garage - Šestine Take a virtual tour of the property at the following link: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=5aLZwPpj2HC We are offering an exclusive villa for sale in an excellent location in Šestine. The villa is situated on a plot of 747 m² and spans four levels, including office space and a garage. The total area of the villa is approximately 580 m², and it consists of the following: Basement (approx. 100 m²): storage room with a boiler room and pool automation. Ground floor: entrance hall, open-plan living room with kitchen and dining area, balcony, access to a terrace and an indoor pool, a bathroom, an additional toilet, and a 20 m² office space with a separate entrance and terrace. First floor: four bedrooms, a kitchen, and a bathroom. Attic: an unfinished open space (roh bau), which can be converted into an additional living unit. In the yard, there is an 80 m² garage for two cars, along with a barbecue area. The villa was originally built before 1968, but underwent a complete renovation in 2021, including new installations, walls, floors, tiles, parquet, and windows. The villa is luxuriously furnished and is being sold as such. Heating: central gas heating with underfloor heating on the ground floor and in all bathrooms. The villa features electric remote-controlled shutters, video surveillance (16 cameras), three air conditioners, and security doors. The property is located near the church and the bus station in Šestine. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
